channel.title: [317] Help with Pking
channel.description:
What file or what code can i use to stop people from duping with the PK Dupe method
*when player1 gets skulled then player2 attacks and player1 logs out before dieing and comes back without loosing anything*
Is there a way i can make it so it Deletes the items instead or drops them?
Or a way to fix it?
Or even Random drops?
Please help if u can! thank you!
